sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Menu, Image, Header,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react' import firebase from '../../firebase' import newsfeedIcon from '../../Images/newsfeed.svg' import flagIcon from '../../Images/flag.svg' import groupIcon from '../../Images/group.svg' import noteIcon from '../../Images/note.svg' import networkIcon from '../../Images/network.svg' class SidePanelLeft extends React.Component{ state = { channels: '', modalOpen : false, channelName: '', channelDetail: '', channelRef: firebase.database().ref('Channels'), user: this.props.currentUser, errors : [], }; render(){ return( Bảng tin Trang Nhóm Tài Liệu Cộng đồng ) } } export default SidePanelLeft;
